title: Masters of the Net
body:
How has modern materialism restricted our views of our larger reality? Highlighting over 40 years of research, former Nuclear-­Biological-Chemical Defense Marine Corps. instructor and founder of Vesica Institute for Holistic Studies Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D., shares the breakthrough knowledge of Sacred Geometry and BioGeometry. 

Exploring the history of the invisible energy matrix which materializes everything in the physical world, Gilbert converts ancient Egyptian wisdom into practical teachings for today. 

See the companion practice in episode 2 of this series, "GOLD Triangle Practice".
teaser: How has modern materialism restricted our views of our larger reality? Highlighting over 40 years of research, Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D., shares the breakthrough knowledge of Sacred Geometry and BioGeometry.

title: Practice: GOLD Triangle
body:
Activate hidden Sacred Geometry centers within your energy body through mastering this practice. These divine centers already exist invisibly within the nets of our energy bodies, and we can use our own mind power to activate them. Join Dr. Gilbert as he guides this first GOLD (Grid of Life Design) Triangle Practice. This practice is demonstrated in a standing position, but can also be done in a comfortable seated position.

The GOLD Triangle Practice is the companion exercise for the “Masters of the Net” teaching from Vesica Institute for Holistic Studies founder Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D.
teaser: Join Dr. Gilbert as he guides this first GOLD (Grid of Life Design) Triangle Practice. The GOLD Triangle Practice is the companion exercise for the “Masters of the Net” teaching from Vesica Institute for Holistic Studies founder Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D.

title: Four Secrets of Sacred Geometry
body:
How do divine patterns of creation define what manifests on every level of physical reality? Founder of the Vesica Institute for Holistic Studies Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D., offers his 40 years of insight into mystical truths, exploring four of the most profound secrets of Sacred Geometry.

Sharing his expertise about the patterns which manifest everything in material existence, Dr. Gilbert offers practical methods for raising awareness to utilize Sacred Geometry and evolve consciousness on individual and planetary levels. 

See the companion practice in episode 4 of this series, "Cubicle Cross Mind Activation".
teaser: How do divine patterns of creation define what manifests on every level of physical reality? Founder of the Vesica Institute for Holistic Studies Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D., offers his 40 years of insight into mystical truths, exploring four of the most profound secrets of Sacred Geometry.

title: Practice: Cubicle Cross Mind Activation
body:
Connect vital circuits of energy within your body by mastering this practice. Using zero-point radiance techniques, you can activate the Cave of Brahma – the third ventricle of the brain, referred to in Sanskrit texts as “the seat of resonance with the ONE ocean of cosmic vibrations.” This center of the mind’s eye can initiate the expansion of your consciousness. This practice is demonstrated in a standing position, but can also be done in a comfortable seated position.

The Cubicle Cross Mind Activation Practice is the companion exercise for the “Four Secrets of Sacred Geometry” teaching from Vesica Institute for Holistic Studies founder Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D.
teaser: Connect vital circuits of energy within your body by mastering this practice. The Cubicle Cross Mind Activation Practice is the companion exercise for the “Four Secrets of Sacred Geometry” teaching from Vesica Institute for Holistic Studies founder Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D.

title: Awakening the Grail Chalice
body:
How does Sacred Geometry create all levels of reality? Exploring the divine language of Sacred Geometry, former USMC instructor and Founder of the Vesica Institute, Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D., explains how different patterns form the sacred geometry alphabet as blueprints of reality cast from higher dimensions. Sharing teachings on universal balance and boundaries of creation, Dr. Gilbert offers methods to utilize these patterns that create reality through BioGeometry.  

See the companion practices in episodes 6 and 7 of this series, "Practice: Healing Energy Sphere" and "Practice: Torus Energy Activation."
teaser: How does Sacred Geometry create all levels of reality? Exploring the divine language of Sacred Geometry, Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D., explains how different patterns form the sacred geometry alphabet as blueprints of reality cast from higher dimensions.

title: Practice: Healing Energy Sphere
body:
Manifest health and happiness by utilizing the sacred geometric form of the sphere to create coherent thought-forms which activate and enhance the vitality of your energy bodies. Transform your energy by mastering this Healing Energy Sphere practice with Dr. Gilbert as your guide. This practice is demonstrated in a standing position, but can also be done in a comfortable seated position.

The Healing Energy Sphere practice is the companion exercise for the “Awakening the Grail Chalice” teaching from Vesica Institute for Holistic Studies founder Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D.
teaser: Manifest health and happiness by utilizing the sacred geometric form of the sphere to create coherent thought-forms which activate and enhance the vitality of your energy bodies. Transform your energy by mastering this Healing Energy Sphere practice with Dr. Gilbert as your guide.

title: Practice: Torus Energy Activation
body:
Activate and clear your entire energy field by encompassing the torus and invoking the grail chalice to receive divinity from above and below through mastering this practice. The practice is demonstrated in a standing position, but can also be done in a comfortable seated position.

The Torus Energy Activation practice is the second companion exercise for the “Awakening the Grail Chalice” teaching from Vesica Institute for Holistic Studies founder Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D.
teaser: Activate and clear your entire energy field by encompassing the torus and invoking the grail chalice to receive divinity from above and below through mastering this practice with Dr. Gilbert as your guide.

title: The Five Elements of Power
body:
How do the relationships between Platonic Solids and their corresponding elements relate to Sacred Geometry? Founder of the Vesica Institute, Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D., explores connections between our energy fields and the elements around us to help teach how we can improve our lives through BioGeometry. Sharing how declassified documents on the Manhattan project he discovered during his time as a Nuclear-Biological-Chemical Warfare Defense instructor for the U.S. Marine Corps revealed connections between Sacred Geometry and atomic bombs, Dr. Gilbert exposes where science meets the sacred. 

See the companion practice in episode 9 of this series, "Practice: Inner Vision Activation".
teaser: How do the relationships between Platonic Solids and their corresponding elements relate to Sacred Geometry? Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D., explores connections between our energy fields and the elements around us.

title: Practice: Inner Vision Activation
body:
How can we fuel energetic changes in our consciousness? Through visualization, learn how to activate new circuits within your mind to incite transformation within your physical and etheric bodies by mastering this practice.

The Inner Vision Activation practice is the companion exercise for the “The Five Elements of Power” teaching from Vesica Institute for Holistic Studies founder Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D.
teaser: How can we fuel energetic changes in our consciousness? Through visualization, learn how to activate new circuits within your mind to incite transformation within your physical and etheric bodies by mastering this practice.

title: The Vesica & Tree of Life
body:
What are the best ways to interact with different spiritual beings and influences we encounter on our spiritual paths? Founder of the Vesica Institute Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D., distills ancient Egyptian temple science with practical methods for enhancing our energy bodies and connecting with non-physical beings. Explore sacred patterns with Dr. Gilbert to learn the secret of creating a portal to the divine by utilizing the Vesica and Tree of Life symbols. 

See the companion practice in episode 11 of this series: "Practice: GOLD Heart Matrix".
teaser: What are the best ways to interact with different spiritual beings and influences we encounter on our path? Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D., distills ancient Egyptian temple science with practical methods for enhancing our energy bodies.

title: Practice: GOLD Heart Matrix
body:
Utilize your knowledge of the Middle Pillar and the Cave of Brahma to continue the construction of your Grid of Life. Building off the GOLD Triangle practice, learn how to heal your heart through invoking divine light into your chakras by mastering this practice.
The GOLD Heart Matrix practice is the companion exercise for the “The Five Elements of Power” teaching from Vesica Institute for Holistic Studies founder Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D.
teaser: Utilize your knowledge of the Middle Pillar and the Cave of Brahma to continue the construction of your Grid of Life. Building off the GOLD Triangle practice, learn how to heal your heart through invoking divine light into your chakras by mastering this practice.

title: Merkaba & the Black Cube
body:
How does the pentagram function as one part of the Merkaba soul vehicle within human energy fields? Explore the secrets of Ancient Egyptian mystery schools, Fibonacci’s Golden Ratio sequence, Rosicrucian energy practices, and the divine power of the Merkaba with Vesica Institute founder Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D. Transform your consciousness by changing your actions and affecting your subtle energy bodies through these time-tested techniques. 

See the companion practice in episode 13 of this series, "Practice: Egyptian Radiant Star".
teaser: How does the pentagram function as one part of the Merkaba soul vehicle within human energy fields? Explore secrets of Ancient Egyptian mystery schools, Fibonacci’s Golden Ratio sequence, and the divine power of the Merkaba with Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D.

title: Practice: Egyptian Radiant Star
body:
Activate and heal the acupuncture meridians of life energy that feed the organs of your body by mastering this practice. Become a receptor of light and energy by standing in the form of the Egyptian Radiant Star, channeling the power of the pentagram.

The Egyptian Radiant Star practice is the companion exercise for the “Merkaba & the Black Cube” teaching from Vesica Institute for Holistic Studies founder Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D.
teaser: Activate and heal the acupuncture meridians of life energy feeding the organs of your body by standing in the form of the Egyptian Radiant Star. Become a receptor of light and energy through channeling the power of the pentagram with Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D. as your guide.

title: The Secret Code of Creation
body:
How does the six-sided star relate to the first level of consciousness and the astral body? Explore secrets of the soul body by uncovering the mysteries of the Merkaba and the star tetrahedron with Vesica Institute founder Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D. Linking Sacred Geometry as the foundation of reality with our own consciousness and divine thought-forms, Dr. Gilbert shares how we can all activate our soul bodies and travel the astral.

See the companion practice in episode 15 of this series, "Practice: GOLD Completion".
teaser: Linking Sacred Geometry as the foundation of reality with our own consciousness and divine thought-forms, Dr. Gilbert shares how we can all activate our soul bodies and travel the astral.

title: Practice: GOLD Completion
body:
Ignite golden triangles of light and heal your chakras by building off previous practices and completing your Grid of Life Design within your energy field. Through mastery of this practice with Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D., you can transform your consciousness and energy across lifetimes.
The GOLD Completion practice is the companion exercise for the “Secret Code of Creation” teaching from Vesica Institute for Holistic Studies founder Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D.
teaser: Ignite golden triangles of light and heal your chakras by building off previous practices and completing your Grid of Life Design within your energy field. Through mastery of this practice with Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D., you can transform your consciousness and energy across lifetimes.

title: Vibrational Secrets Revealed
body:
How can we utilize sacred geometry to unlock secrets of healing on a cellular level? Exploring decades of research in relation to timeless truths, Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D., shares how the work of Hans Jenny, John Stuart Reid, Mandara Cromwell, and Dr. Peter Manners can heal humanity by utilizing the unseen energies that give geometric patterns their true power. 

Linking Daoist alchemy, Rosicrucian wisdom, and “The Holy Science” of the Babaji lineage with cymatic science (the effect of sound waves on matter) and cymatherapy, Dr. Gilbert exposes the vibrational structures that form the foundations of our physical reality.
teaser: How can we utilize sacred geometry to unlock secrets of healing on a cellular level? Exploring decades of research, Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D., shares how we can heal humanity by utilizing the unseen energies that give geometric patterns their true power.

title: BioGeometry: Creating the New Golden Age
body: How has ancient Egyptian energy science been given a modern rebirth as a universal system? Linking the singularity with zero point energy techniques, Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D., reveals the fractal nature of our universe through exploration of BioGeometry and the history of its founder, Egyptian architect and natural scientist Dr. Ibrahim Karim. Explore these inner worlds that connect every individual to the Divine Plane by unleashing your true essence through ancient Egyptian energy practices modernized by Dr. Gilbert and Dr. Karim.
teaser: How has ancient Egyptian energy science been given a modern rebirth as a universal system? Explore inner worlds linking all to the Divine Plane by unleashing your essence through ancient Egyptian energy practices modernized by Dr. Gilbert and Dr. Karim.

title: Sacred Geometry of Relationships
body:
How can we ignite the cosmic process of spiritual evolution in order to transcend earthly incarnations and attain interdependence? Exposing the ancient truths of polarity to explore relationship patterns rooted in sacred geometry, Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D., shares how we can overcome cyclical trauma to evolve into independent free agents of the divine universe.

Learn the sacred geometric structures behind every relationship as Dr. Gilbert offers transcendental insight into the human condition and our evolution, relating to principles such as the Vesica Pisces.
teaser: How can we ignite the cosmic process of spiritual evolution in order to transcend earthly incarnations and attain interdependence? Exposing the ancient truths of polarity to explore relationship patterns rooted in sacred geometry, Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D., shares how we can overcome cyclical trauma to evolve into independent free agents of the divine universe.
